content.rendered:
Who are we
Our Projects
Our Team

ABOUT US

Services

We’re MediaZone — a 360° creative and marketing agency.
For 15+ years, we’ve helped bold brands grow through smart strategy, design, and digital execution.
From branding to web and media, our team delivers tailored solutions that make impact and inspire action.

MediaZone Agency aims to be the region’s most trusted and
forward-thinking marketing partner—
driven by bold ideas, integrated strategies, and brand experiences
that inspire, grow, and lead.

VISION

At MediaZone, our mission is to empower brands with creative, data
driven marketing solutions.
We provide integrated services—from branding to media production—
focused on real growth and lasting impact.
With a forward-thinking team, we build partnerships, not just campaigns.

Mission

Founded over 15 years ago, MediaZone set out to help brands grow in a
fast-changing digital world.
We’ve supported 78+ businesses—startups and established brands—by
creating brand stories that connect, inspire, and drive real growth.
Because at MediaZone, we don’t just market—we transform.

OUR STORY

Our Team

  • Marketing Team
  • Business Dev. Team
  • Graphic Design Team
  • Technology Team
  • Human Resource

Meetour
Founder

Mr Haitham
Fayed

At the heart

of Media Zone Agency is the creative force and visionary leadership of Mr. Haitham Fayed. With over a decade of experience in media production, branding, and digital storytelling, Mr. Fayed founded Media Zone to challenge the norms of traditional marketing and redefine how brands connect with audiences in the modern world.
